name: Elf Alone
description:
Controls: WASD/Mouse/E to interact

I had fun making this. There's a lot of goofy Monty Python-ish jokes in it "hidden" about, some would call it "gallows humor." Also, you can jump really high in this game. I've wanted to do a game where the player jumps really high for a while.

There are three possible endings and an optional challenge.

I recently reuploaded a game, so if you like this game, maybe try that one, too, because I also had a lot of fun making it. It's called Doll Vs Claws and you play as a cat who fights back against an evil doll! 

Here's the link: https://snakewinter.itch.io/doll-vs-claws

"Elf Alone" was made for the Broke After X-Mas Jam, the theme was Burn the Tree: https://itch.io/jam/broke-after-xmas

"Dreamy Hawaii" by Waikiki Hawaiian Orchestra; F. W. Vandersloot

https://archive.org/details/78_dreamy-hawaii_waikiki-hawaiian-orchestra-f-w-vand...

Coppercube "Do later" Extension: 

https://www.ambiera.com/coppercube/download_extensions.html

This game was worked on from December 31, 2022 - January 7, 2023.
